title: Minecraft 主机版 1.92 发布
author: Mithey
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Mithey 于 2019-6-6 21:25 编辑 

主机版即PlayStation 4版，由4J Studios为Mojang开发。
迎接新的正式版吧！
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。
来源:
https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/minecraft-editions/minecraft-playstation-4-edition/mcps4-discussion/2230179-ps4-patch-change-logs
更新日志 -2019年6月5日

Fixed a bug that could cause the game to lag or crash while exploring near Pillager Outposts.修复了在探索掠夺者前哨站时造成的游戏卡顿或崩溃Fixed a crash that could occur when Mobs tried to pathfind through Berry Bushes.修复了生物在经过浆果丛时造成的崩溃Fixed an occasional crash caused by Evoker Fangs.修复了唤魔者的尖牙造成的偶然崩溃Fixed an occasional crash caused by interacting with Wandering Trader Llamas right after they spawn.修复了在流浪商人的羊驼生成后交易造成的偶然崩溃Fixed an occasional crash caused by being near Campfire blocks.修复了在靠近营火方块时造成的偶然崩溃Fixed an occasional crash caused by scaling maps.修复了在缩放地图时造成的崩溃Fixed a bug that could stop Farmers from picking up beetroot seeds.修复了村民无法捡起甜菜根种子的错误Fixed a bug that allowed Villagers to breed when they shouldn't.修复了允许村民在不该繁殖时繁殖的错误Added missing Banner and Sign "Place" tooltips.添加了旗帜和告示牌“已放置”的提示Updated textures for Grindstone and Stained Glass.更新了砂轮和染色玻璃的材质Corrected some spelling mistakes.修正了一些拼写错误




外部来源以及详细的更新条目追踪

Minecraft官网（内容英文）4JStudios的Twitter（英文，内地需魔法上网）Minecraft官方论坛（英文）官方更新日志（英文）Minecraft博客（英文）英语Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（英文，更新条目详细，较及时）中文 Minecraft Wiki的主机版版本记录页面（中文，更新条目详细）
